channel.title: [508]HELP: Requiring money to spawn -- Adding spirit Shields - -
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm wondering how I can make it so when you try to spawn an item, it costs money. Example, ::item 4151 1 would spawn you a whip, and it would cost you 1,603,020 GP.
I also need to set it so using ::item is available for players. I'd also like to set it so you can't spawn some items, like fighter torsos, godswords, partyhats.. ETC.
Furthermore, I'm wondering how I can add Spirit Shields to the server.
Thanks,
~Valance

item.title: [508]HELP: Requiring money to spawn -- Adding spirit Shields - -
item.dc:creator: @Valance Valance
item.source: [508]HELP: Requiring money to spawn -- Adding spirit Shields - -

item.title: [508]HELP: Requiring money to spawn -- Adding spirit Shields - -
item.dc:creator: @My_name_is_anthony My name is anthony
item.description:
@My_name_is_anthony wrote:

Im not good at 508s but ill briefly describe it, basicly the prizes are defined, and then the ::item command would use the price thats defined. Download Z508 and look at the ::item command and maybe rip it out and put it in yours.

And for the spirit shields add it as a model or add a 525 cache to your 508 client.

Read full topic
item.source: [508]HELP: Requiring money to spawn -- Adding spirit Shields - -
